column1: Little Goat Diner////Little Goat Diner is a relatively good iteration from Girl & the Goat. The essence is to take the traditional diner experience and infuse it with adventurous culinary ideas. That said
column2: I recommend staying closer to classic diner foods. I ordered the smoked corn beef hash with eggs
column3: prepared sunny side up along with a chocolate milk. The corned beef was plentiful and actually infused with a smokey taste. The eggs were classic in their style
column4: fried and runny over the thin
column7: and accompanied by bits of corned beef. The chocolate milk was so-so
column8: not sure I would order it again.
